alfredsnippet.snippet:
Conversations with God, Neale Donald Walsch, Book 3, p.150

"... we are not in fourth grade in this planet. We are in first. Is that it?

My child you are not yet even in kindergarten. You are in nursery school ... The majority of your race does not want to accept that you have not yet evolved to kindergarten. It does not want to accept that the human race is still in nursery school. Yet this lack of acceptance is exactly what keeps it there."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Majority of Your Race Does Not Want to Accept that You Have Not Yet Evolved to Kindergarten
